Value.label: Siren Alarm Duration
Value.Help: Siren Alarm Duration, in seconds. Defaults to 600 (10 minutes).

Value.label: Temp/Humidity Reporting Interval
Value.Help: Reporting interval for temperature and humidity sensor, in miuntes. Defaults to 1440 (24 hours).

Value.label: Custom Sound Selection for Audio Speaker
Value.Help: Selector for custom audio files that have been manually uploaded to the alarm unit. 0 sets to no sound (default), while 1-99 selects the sound file number in the library to be used.
